data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Bamako, Mali to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bamako, Mali not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.section_summary: On average, 107 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Bamako, Mali.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bamako who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Bamako, Mali.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Fulani, Pulaar people.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Bamako. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,447 believers in Bamako, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bamako, Mali has a population of 971,400.

We estimate Bamako has 6,447 people who might know Jesus, 20,761 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 944,191 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 150 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Bamako that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.
